enter_the_details_of_the_company: Enter the details of the company you want to add to your account
there_is_no_company_registered: There is no company registered with this number. Enter a correct company number.
you_must_enter_a_company_number: You must enter a company number for a company that is active.
you_can_find_this_by_searching: You can find this by searching for the company on the Companies House redister (opens in new tab).
